subject: Angle on the pedal
description_text:
[image: image.png]I cant adjust the angle as there is a black piece of
metal in the way, do i just remove it or am i doing something wrong?

[image: image.png]

conversations.body_text: Hi Cmbo,   If you need to adjust the pedal angle, you can remove the black cover plate. Its purpose is mainly to keep the pedal looking neat in its default position, and removing it won’t affect functionality. You can use an M3 hex screwdriver to take it off and then adjust the pedal angle as needed.
